name: An Ode To The Mountains V2

metadata.name: You Rise when you SACRIFICE
metadata.description:
Rising to the top in this world is never easy. It always comes with a price , and sometimes the price is a little too much to pay . But if we are resilient and positive we might be able to make it, we just might. But if we don't try for sure would not be able to make it to the top.



Artist  - Ritam Bhattacharya
Genre - Landscape Photography
Edition - 1/1
Place - Darjeeling, India
